featured.text: Tree products have been an important part of diets for thousands of years, from early humans 26 fruits and nuts to the first cultivation of important trees, such as mango and apple.
Mangoes are a _____ fruit here in Taiwan; most of them reach their peak of sweetness in July.

definition.zh_def: 芒果，一種熱帶水果，外皮通常為黃色或橙色，果肉甜美多汁。
definition.en_def: A mango is a tropical fruit with a usually yellow or orange skin and sweet, juicy flesh.
definition.example: I love eating mangoes in the summer.
